DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: Sanger sequencing fasta file from bacterial communities associated with the trophosome of Ridgeia piscesae - A Canadian Healthy Oceans Network Population Connectivity project, PC-11
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: Near-complete SSU rRNA gene sequences obtained from the trophosome Ridgeia piscesae in hydrothermal habitats contrasted by flow regime. This data was obtained from Sanger sequencing.
DryadDataFile.dcterms:subject: hydrothermal vents
symbiosis
vestimentiferans
Sanger sequencing
